description: Institutional Strengthening of the ministry of State for the Marshlands - Iraq

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1.Consolidation of information on current plans and initiatives in the Marshlands, an effective information management system, and improved review processes in the IMDA.
2. Clear planning and project approval mandate, appropriate structure, and effective processes defined for the Iraq Marshlands Development Authority (IMDA).
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Institutional Strengthening

title: Institutional Strengthening Ministry of State Marshlands
